meanings.sent1: Seeing a rainbow at night is quite unusual.
meanings.sent2: It is unusual to see snow in summer.
meanings.sent3: The cat wearing a hat was quite unusual.
meanings.sent4: Her kindness was as unusual as finding a diamond in the sand.
meanings.sent5: The sound of laughter in a library was as unusual as a fish climbing a tree.

meanings.definition: Different from what is usual or normal.
meanings.sent1: Her unusual hairstyle caught everyone's attention.
meanings.sent2: The unusual color of the flower made it stand out.
meanings.sent3: It was unusual to see a penguin in the desert.
meanings.sent4: His unusual talent for mimicry was like having a human parrot around.
meanings.sent5: The unusual smell in the kitchen was as distinct as a rose in a field of daisies.
